base_description: Gray rectangular cabinet with drawers and doors.
part_description: Two drawers on top, two doors below; symmetrical arrangement. Handles on each part for access.
internal_interaction_description: Drawers slide in and out within the cabinet, supported by internal rails. Doors swing open on hinges, providing access to internal storage space. Handles facilitate opening and closing.
external_interaction_description: Cabinet can be placed against a wall for stability. Used for storage, interacting with users who open drawers and doors to access contents. Can support items on top surface.
